title: Looking to make a poro team.
body:
ELITE PORO TEAM 


 Why create the team?  
I'm currently gold IV at the moment, maining support in ranked normal mode. However woud like to create a competitive poro team, like maybe we have set plays like a cho gath knocks a player up and the whole team chucks 5 poros at it. that's half a boss poro already. I'll be playing a mean urgot, hit me up in game.


These are requirements of joining

 Must be friendly 
 Must have skype 


Contact information:
IGN : HTMekkatorque
Skype : Lee.weldon4 (Req = Must have Skype for decent communication)

replies.body: You realise poros dont stack on the same player until the debuff wears off right?..
what? all poros deal their full damage and add stacks when they land....if they didnt that would be stupid.
Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.

> [{quoted}](name=xXLexiBelleXx,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=AYMmnX9r,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-22T00:12:43.677+0000)
>
> Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make **ranked teams.**

Except OP is talking about Legend Of The Poro King, not ranked...
